column4: Bahzang, I'm following the guides but there is a problem, my ubuntu partition isnt showing up, it only shows up in when I go to partition editor
The only partition I see is the 33gb windows partition, not the 150 gb ubuntu partition
Im trying to restore Grub after installing Windows 7 but the guide tells me to mount my ubuntu partition which isnt showing up. Anyone?
fdisk -s <partition>      give partition size(s) in blocks
-u <size>                 give sizes in sectors instead of cylinders
-S <number>               specify the number of sectors per track
